entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assert failure in SetLoaderAllocator() when calling a DynamicMethod in separate module and custom AssemblyLoadContext #110987
  • JIT doesn't elide bounds checking when iterating over a span and an array of known length #110986
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add some Memory API to do tricky mappings #110984

Closed

  • Environment.ProcessPath hangs with exe path > MAX_PATH #110800
  • Random "Access violation writing location" error while calling ToFrozenDictionary after updating from .NET 8 to .NET 9 #110981

PullRequests

Created

  • [S390x] Fix endian bug in minipal #110985
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Revert "Fix NativeAOT ThunksPool thunk data block size handling." #110983
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Observe any exception on HTTP connection scavenge. #110982
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix GetModuleFileName in GetProcessPath #110888
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution

Updated

  • System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException thrown on a retrieval of derived attribute with overridden property getter #110945
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Warn on method access in Requires analyzers #110086
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Unwrap NullableValue for diagnostics creation and add try/catch for formatting diagnostics #110229
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Use managed signer for bundles #110417
    area-HostModel
  • Use correct product version in SPC in servicing #110980
    area-System.Runtime
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix `ConvertTypeCheckPatternToNullCheck` #110973
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Clean up in LowerFusedMultiplyAdd #110113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
